value:
$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|This is the temple of the Rite of Frost,
a ritual spoken of in the legends of
my people...$k$pI've never seen it before. In fact,
without the divine weapon that
$Nu carries...$k$pI don't think we'd ever have found it at
all.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Stay sharp. It looks like Heroes guard
the temple. Could it be that Askr's
power called them here?$k$pIt may be that in an era now forgotten,
Nifl and Askr were allied...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Let's hurry to the inner sanctum. We
don't have time to waste!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|If we keep heading this way, we
should find the inner sanctum. Follow
me.$k$p

$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Return to Múspell? But why?$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|There's just the matter of a small rite
we need to take care of.$k$pThe king himself has invited you to join
us. You ought to be grateful.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Well, I'm not! And don't think that you
have my permission to leave, either.
You're staying.$k$pDon't lose sight of the fact that Askr
has not yet been destroyed.$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Ha-hah! Oh, Princess. Listen and
listen well.$k$p$EFace|I'm not inviting you to Múspell. I'm
ordering you to Múspell.$k$pAnd if you don't cooperate, I'll break
your legs and drag you there myself.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Anger|What?$k$p$WmMPID_マークス,ch05_21_Marks_M_Normal,Face|How dare you!$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|Ah, the dog who runs with Embla! We
were interrupted before. Shall we
settle things now?$k$pI'll leave your charred corpse on the
ground! Ha-hah!$k$p$Sbs150|
